summary: Rogue Sorceress Armor, made for females. Retextured to brown version. Standalone version. Both armored and clothed versions. For Rogues/warriors and for mages.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][size=6][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][i][center][/center][/i][/size][/font][/size][center][size=6][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][i]﻿﻿﻿﻿Numus presents:
Rogue Sorceress Outfit
RETEXTURED
[/i][/size][/font]
--- STAND ALONE FILE ---

[size=6][size=3]This mod contains armor meshes, textures and .esp, no other mod required.[/size][/size][/size][/center]
﻿ ﻿ [/size][center][size=6] ﻿﻿﻿[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9088]-CLICK ME FOR SKYRIM SPECIAL EDITION-[/url][/size][size=6][/size][/center][size=6]
[img]http://i59.tinypic.com/2wmpglf.jpg[/img]
[/size]



         
                                                                     
[size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]- Working weight slider. 
[/font]- [font=Comic Sans MS]Armored and clothed versions[/font]
[/size][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]- Female only
- Upgradable
- Craftable and pre-enchanted ( only in Frostfall version )
- Requires 1.9 version of the game. No dlc required.[/size]

[/font] 




 Thank you Hodilton for the video preview.
[youtube]16LVf0w3OtE[/youtube]




[size=3][u][b]Location:[/b][/u][/size][size=4]  [/size][size=2]Riverwood, in a barrel. [u]Check the screenshot.[/u]  Or this:  [url=http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57124-1-1408282253.jpg]location of the outfit[/url][/size]


[u][size=3][b]Installation:[/b][/size][/u]   Download the mod. Once you've downloaded my mod, open the downloaded file with winrar. Then extract everything into your                                        Skyrim data directory.  My file consists of one esp file, texture and mesh folders. 




[u][b][size=3]READ THIS:[/size][/b][/u][font=Trebuchet MS][b] [/b]  

[/font]1. This mod has some armor rating improvement. The outfit gives you a bit more armor than the original. 
2. You can improve it at any workbench and it is also enchantable ( both outfit and the cloaks )
3. It is a standalone file, which means you can have both this mod installed and the one from theRoadstroker, it won't cause any conflit.
    [u]- both armors can be obtained the same way.[/u]
4. I've made this beacause people of Skyrim were in dying need of this version. Also, I've got permission from theRoadstroker to do this.
5. Have fun playing.




[i][u]If you encounter any problems, whether with gameplay or installation, please feel free to contact me and I'll gladly help.


[/u][/i][size=4][b][u]Do not, under any circumstance re-upload this mod without giving credit to the author. [/u][/b][/size]
author: Numus

files.name: NORMAL version. Contains armored and clothed version. Download this if you do not have Frostfall mod.
Frostfall version. Download this if you have Frostfall installed. No other mods or updates required.
files.fileName: Frostfall version. Download this if you have Frostfall installed. No other mods or updates required.-57124-1Full-Ff.rar
